Review: The best barber shop in Santa Monica!!Free parking lot in front of the shop. Great prices and friendly staff.
Best fades on the westside. I followed Soto from Lincoln Barbers. He takes his time and treats his customers with respect. Congrats on opening up your own shop!
Outstanding haircuts at a decent price. Great vibe and relaxed place. If you like real barbers, Fernando is Tops!
This place rocks! The people here know what they are doing.  I always leave the barber feeling new again.  The lady and guy cut hair like they really enjoy doing it. Thanks for all you do!

I was referred to Fernando Soto by my boss. I needed a last minute haircut before I left town to vacation with my girlfriend - Fernando said: "no problem, come on down now!" Mr. Soto's new shop (only 2 months old) is spacious, comforting, and rustic. I got a stellar haircut and Fernando finished it off with warm shaving cream and straight razor; fresh. Fernando, you've earned a loyal customer. Thank you!

Soto is the absolute best!! My friends and I have been going to him for several years, ever since he was at Lincoln's (which is also great). Soto treats all of his clients with the utmost respect, and his attention to detail is second to none. Plus, you can't beat his prices (be sure to get the $2 rinse and shampoo, it's well worth it)! I highly recommend Soto's to anyone looking for a great haircut in the LA-area!

Fernando (Soto) has been giving me a straight edge razor shave (replete with hot towels and hot shaving cream) for several years - starting at Lincoln Barbers. He's also given shaves and haircuts to all three of my sons. He is THE BEST (El Mejor!).  Nobody cares more about their craft and their customers than Fernando. Nobody has the breadth of experience and skills as Fernando.  He's got a winning personality and I couldn't be happier that he finally has his own place. If you're looking for a quality haircut or shave in Santa Monica for a VERY reasonable price - look NO further.  Soto Barber Shop is the place for you!!
Great place . I came last Friday for the first time and they treated me very nice and gave me a wonderful hair cut . Will come back for sure .

Fernando is a great barber who in the last three years has been consistent with providing great cuts and customer service - always striving to ensure customer satisfaction.  I recommend him to anyone looking for a great barber.

Fernando Soto is the best barber around.  He is very patient and great at what he does.  He is also great with kids.  Give him a try you will be happy!  I have been going to him for many years and I've always left very satisfied.  Now he has his own place so he is extra attentive!
Best barber ever! Los mejores! First time here in LA and they were really helpful. Plus... I got great haircut
I've known Fernando for over 4 years now. At least once a month I come in for my hair cut! He's very professional & knows what he's doing. Thank you for always making me look good :)

I just moved to the area and was in desperate need of a good barber. Luckily I found Soto! The haircut was far superior than other competitors' haircuts I had tried in Santa Monica and Westwood. The atmosphere is very clean and relaxed. They also have complimentary water and coffee! I'm glad I finally found my shop.

This new barber shop is great! Convenient location with free parking. Nice feel inside, very clean and comfortable. Soto, my barber, did a fantastic job with my cut. Delivered exactly what I wanted! Great price for great and friendly service.

Best barber in LA. 7yrs ago I moved to LA and tried a bunch of different spots, but when I came across Soto I found my barber. I haven't had to worry about a haircut since. Does a consistently great job every time and is also 'good people'. Call for appt, he always accommodates w my schedules. Happy he has his own place now, he's earned it.
Best barber in town!!!!! I got a shave fade' soto is an executive barber!!   I highly recommend

Soto is the best in the game!! Treats you like family, not a chop shop, been going to him for almost 7 years (was at different place before). Him and his wife treat you like you are at their home and their cuts are NEVER rushed.

I have been going to Fernando for about 5 years before he moved and opened his own shop.  He has improved on all the things that was wrong with his last shop:  air conditioning, complimentary coffee and water. He is the nicest guy.  Always cheerful, helpful and glad to see you.  Fernando takes his time and  does a neat, careful and professional job.  My hair is easy cut however I have always been happy with the work he has done.  The shop is in the corner of a strip mall a few homeless hanging around but nothing too difficult to navigate.  Fernando is even paying one of these unfortunates to sweep the sidewalk in front once in a while.
Absolutely love Soto! Always a great cut at a great price! Highly recommend!! Been coming for months now and have never been disappointed.

I found this place randomly and stopped in. Turns out the guy that owns this was the best barber from Lincoln barbers up the street. The place is nice, the haircut was a fair price and the attention to detail was excellent. I highly would recommend this place. Since the first visit I have his # and get an appointment for cuts. No wait time with appointments, excellent consistency. I'll go to Fernando Soto for my haircuts from now on.
